movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: Dazed and Confused
movies.description: The adventures of incoming high school and junior high students on the last day of school, in May of 1976.
movies.starring: Jason London, Wiley Wiggins, Matthew McConaughey

movies.title: Black Hawk Down
movies.description: 123 elite U.S. soldiers drop into Somalia to capture two top lieutenants of a renegade warlord and find themselves in a desperate battle with a large force of heavily-armed Somalis.
movies.starring: Josh Hartnett, Ewan McGregor, Tom Sizemore

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.description: When Batman, Gordon and Harvey Dent launch an assault on the mob, they let the clown out of the box, the Joker, bent on turning Gotham on itself and bringing any heroes down to his level.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.description: Forrest Gump, while not intelligent, has accidentally been present at many historic moments, but his true love, Jenny Curran, eludes him.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.description: Henry Hill and his friends work their way up through the mob hierarchy.
movies.starring: Robert De Niro, Ray Liotta, Joe Pesci
